member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC
member.summary: Describes the types of messages to allow or deny to pass through a filter.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.NumCategories
member.summary: The number of message categories to allow or deny.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.pCategoryList
member.summary: An array of enumeration values that describe the message categories to allow or deny. The array must have at least NumCategories number of elements.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.NumSeverities
member.summary: The number of message severity levels to allow or deny.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.pSeverityList
member.summary: An array of enumeration values that describe the message severity levels to allow or deny. The array must have at least NumSeverities number of elements.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.NumIDs
member.summary: The number of message IDs to allow or deny.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.pIDList
member.summary: An array of integers that represent the message IDs to allow or deny. The array must have at least NumIDs number of elements.
